page.title: Leaders Day 2021 Agenda
page.description: We’re exploring what it means to be Parish Minded with our local Parish experts, aka you. Let’s hang out, share stories, and learn from each other about how we can best lead and care for our communities.

content.title: Leaders Day 2021 Agenda
content.description: We’re exploring what it means to be Parish Minded with our local Parish experts, aka you. Let’s hang out, share stories, and learn from each other about how we can best lead and care for our communities.

content.text1: We’re exploring what it means to be Parish Minded with our local Parish experts, aka you. Let’s hang out, share stories, and learn from each other about how we can best lead and care for our communities.

button1.description: Click to watch leaders day live

image1.alt: Two men inside of a building smiling and hugging.

content.text1: We’ve got lots of practical topics for you to explore and choose from in your two breakout sessions. Where do you want to lean in?

list.title: Creating spaces that work for the whole family - Natalie Frisk
list.text: We’re not just talking about a nuclear family, but every age and stage. We’ll look at discipleship through a lens of intergenerational experiences and discover how we can really connect in meaningful ways.
list.imageAlt: Young woman leaning against wall smiling

list.title: Creating Community In An Online World - Jordan Duerrstein, Lynn Long, Mary Kate MacPherson
list.text: March 2020 was a big shift in our church life. Come learn and discuss some best practices for creating environments online that are accessible, engaging, and spiritually transformative.
list.imageAlt: Headshot of one man and two women.

list.title: Caring for others while caring for yourself - Kathy Bernard & Martie Whitaker
list.text: Setting healthy boundaries can be one of the most loving things you can do. Join us as we look at how to set boundaries in a Jesus-centred way.
list.imageAlt: Headshot of a man and a woman.

list.title: What are Fresh Expressions of Church? - Jon Hand & Stephen Kidd
list.text: Fresh Expressions are innovative ways to build community and introduce spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life. We’ll share stories and tools to help us be the church for those not into church.
list.imageAlt: Headshot of a man and a photo of another man on a sailboat.

list.title: Walking Through Divisive Days as A Leader - Chris Chase
list.text: In days of deep division, how do we model grace and acceptance when people feel othered? Let’s listen and share about ways we can “keep the main thing the main thing” and work toward unity together.
list.imageAlt: Side profile photo of a man smiling.

list.title: Simple Ways to Become More Invested in Your Neighbourhood - Steve MacDouell, Carol MacLean, and Sandy MacLean
list.text: Together, we’ll explore some small-scale, practical ways we can start to become more present, attentive, and engaged in our neighbourhoods and the people we share them with.
list.imageAlt: Headshot of a man and a picture of a couple embrancing for the photo.

content.text1: If you’ve got questions or want to have some practical convos about leading things like Tech, Set-Up, Music, Compassion, Kids, Prayer, or Youth this season, hop in the Idea Sharing Lobby during Breakout Session #1 to chat with other folks in your role.
